```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```



## Plotly examples


```{r}
data("instacart")

instacart2 = 
  instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    department = as.factor(department)
  ) %>% 
  filter(department == "beverages" & reordered == 1) %>% 
  select(-order_id, -eval_set)


instacart2 %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~order_hour_of_day, y = ~days_since_prior_order, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
    color = ~order_dow, text = ~product_name, alpha = 0.5
  )


```


```{r}

instacart2 %>% 
  mutate(
    product_name = as.factor(product_name),
    product_name = fct_reorder(product_name, days_since_prior_order)
  ) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~days_since_prior_order, color = ~product_name, type = "box")

```
